bug.short_desc: List: Scrollbar not updated after toggling icons/labels

long_desc.thetext:
Toggling between "Show Icon" and "Show Text" changes the content height of the list (clearly seen because of some big icons). The scrollbar does not adjust itself to the new smaller size after switching from icons to pure text. The list can be scrolled down into the now empty space where no list items exist.
This bug applies to Firefox 1.5 and 2.0 under Win/Linux. Behavior is as expected in IE7, Opera 9.02.

This is a bug in gecko. Nothing really new ;)
This affects all overflowing areas like trees, lists, etc. This bad behavior was introduced with gecko 1.8. It was OK in Firefox 1.0 (aka gecko-1.7).

Being a bug in Firefox 1.5/2.0 it is not expected to have a bugfix soon. There are no plans for workarounds either (which could be changing size of the parent container and reverting size changes afterwards).
If available, please add links into the Firefox bugzilla for reference.
